title: People that abuse the report feature
body: Just remember this game ain't all sunshine and rainbow it will beat you to your knees if you let it. PEOPLE WILL BE TOXIC, PEOPLE WILL FEED, PEOPLE WILL AFK INFRONT OF UR FACE, PEOPLE WILL NOT SAVE YOU ! NOW GROW A PAIR AND GET BACK INTO THE BATTLE FIELD !!!!!

replies.body: This isn't a battlefield though, it's a game. People come here to enjoy themselves. If others are ruining the game for the community, they are typically not welcome, and reporting is how you vote for what is not acceptable in that community.
